title: Following their footsteps
brief_description: The small towns of Kernot and Grantville in south-eastern Victoria, depend on volunteer emergency services to ensure that when fires break out, car accidents happen or cats are stuck in trees, that someone is there to help. Who better to have on call than local legend Barrie Stewart and the dedicated members of the Kernot/Grantville CFA.
